testcase.classname: To validate the important links in Inmakes Learning Hub
testcase.name: To check the links
testcase.system-out: Given To launch browser and maximise the window............................passed When To launch URL application.............................................passed And To scroll down to the bottom of the page................................passed And To click the Home link button...........................................passed And To click the All Course link button.....................................passed And To click the Login link button..........................................passed And To click the User Agreement link button.................................passed And To click the Privacy Policy link button.................................passed
